class.name: cub_mapping/PointCloudTo2DTool
class.description: Interactive tool to convert 3D point clouds to 2D occupancy grid maps. Use mouse to position, scroll to adjust height, Shift+scroll for width, Ctrl+scroll for height range. Press 'z' to activate, left-click to add region.

class.name: cub_mapping/WaypointEditTool
class.description: Interactive tool for creating and editing navigation waypoints. Press 'w' to activate. Move mouse to position waypoint, scroll wheel to adjust orientation. Left-click to place waypoint. Press 'a' for Add mode, 's' for Select, 'm' for Move, 'r' for Rotate.
